NO_RESULTS.title: No Results
NO_RESULTS.heading: No Quiz Results
NO_RESULTS.message: No results were found for this session. To take the nerd quiz, please make an account

CANNOT_TAKE_QUIZ_EMAIL_FAILED.title: Cannot take quiz
CANNOT_TAKE_QUIZ_EMAIL_FAILED.heading: Email address already failed quiz
CANNOT_TAKE_QUIZ_EMAIL_FAILED.message: We're sorry, but your email has already taken and failed the quiz this period.  You will receive an email when you can make another attempt.

CANNOT_TAKE_QUIZ_EMAIL_EXISTS.title: Cannot take quiz
CANNOT_TAKE_QUIZ_EMAIL_EXISTS.heading: Account exists
CANNOT_TAKE_QUIZ_EMAIL_EXISTS.message: We're sorry, but an account with this email already exists.

CANNOT_TAKE_QUIZ_NO_EMAIL.title: Cannot take quiz
CANNOT_TAKE_QUIZ_NO_EMAIL.heading: Register to take quiz
CANNOT_TAKE_QUIZ_NO_EMAIL.message: To take the nerd quiz, you must first register by providing your email

CANNOT_RESET_PASSWORD_NO_EMAIL.title: Cannot take quiz
CANNOT_RESET_PASSWORD_NO_EMAIL.heading: Register to take quiz
CANNOT_RESET_PASSWORD_NO_EMAIL.message: To change your password, you must first send an email verification here

ALREADY_LOGGED_IN.title: Cannot create account
ALREADY_LOGGED_IN.heading: Cannot create account
ALREADY_LOGGED_IN.message: You already have an account (and are logged in).  What are you trying to pull?

NO_ACCOUNT_QUIZ_FAILED.title: Cannot create account
NO_ACCOUNT_QUIZ_FAILED.heading: Cannot create account
NO_ACCOUNT_QUIZ_FAILED.message: We're sorry, but you may not create an account since you previously failed the quiz

NO_ACCOUNT_TAKE_QUIZ.title: Cannot create account
NO_ACCOUNT_TAKE_QUIZ.heading: Cannot create account
NO_ACCOUNT_TAKE_QUIZ.message: To create an account, you must first register and take the nerd quiz

ACCOUNT_CREATE_FAILED.title: Could not create account
ACCOUNT_CREATE_FAILED.heading: Could not create account
ACCOUNT_CREATE_FAILED.message: There was an error when creating your account, please retry the process form the beginning

ACCOUNT_CREATED.title: Account Created
ACCOUNT_CREATED.heading: Account Created Successfully
ACCOUNT_CREATED.message: Your account was created successfully.  Return the the home page to log in.

EMAIL_ACCOUNT_SETUP.title: Email Sent
EMAIL_ACCOUNT_SETUP.heading: Email Sent Successfully
EMAIL_ACCOUNT_SETUP.message: An email containing a link to the quiz has been sent to your email.

EMAIL_INVITE_FRIEND.title: Email Sent
EMAIL_INVITE_FRIEND.heading: Email Sent Successfully
EMAIL_INVITE_FRIEND.message: An email was successfully sent to your friend

EMAIL_PASSWORD_RESET.title: Email Sent
EMAIL_PASSWORD_RESET.heading: Email Sent Successfully
EMAIL_PASSWORD_RESET.message: A password reset link has been sent to your email address

PASSWORD_CHANGE_FAILED.title: Could not change password
PASSWORD_CHANGE_FAILED.heading: Could not change password
PASSWORD_CHANGE_FAILED.message: Your password could not be changed, please try again

PASSWORD_CHANGE_FAILED_NOT_ACCOUNT.title: Could not change password
PASSWORD_CHANGE_FAILED_NOT_ACCOUNT.heading: Could not change password
PASSWORD_CHANGE_FAILED_NOT_ACCOUNT.message: Your password could not be changed because the email you entered does not correspond with an account
